description:
For more than three decades, Keating Law Office has provided strong legal representation for members of the Warren, Ohio, community facing various legal issues. Our comprehensive law firm has the experience to take on difficult cases involving probate administration, divorce, criminal charges and civil litigation.

Probate Administration And Estate Planning

We can help you through probate administration to arrange the final affairs of a loved one after he or she passes, navigating any disputes or challenges dividing the estate. At Keating Law Office, we provide comprehensive estate planning, which includes drafting wills, naming durable powers of attorney and establishing trusts.

Family Law Attorney

Our law firm will represent you throughout the divorce process, and work to establish child custody or a shared parenting plan, arrange support payments, and divide assets and liabilities. Our skilled representation is highly beneficial in resolving enforcement or modification orders. We can guide you in realistically viewing difficult family law challenges to diffuse emotions and work toward a favorable outcome.

Defending You Against Criminal Charges

You cannot expunge a drunk driving offense from your criminal record in Ohio. Call our law firm as soon as possible if you are facing a traffic violation or drunk driving charge. At Keating Law Office, we can protect your rights and defend you against the charges you are facing.

Strong Representation In Civil Litigation

Dan Keating is a lawyer licensed to practice in federal court. We will advocate on behalf of you and your interests in a range of civil litigation matters, including business, contract and real estate disputes. We will also advocate for your full compensation in personal injury and wrongful death claims.

We can help you resolve your legal challenge. Call our law firm in Warren, Ohio, to discuss the specifics of your case.
